profile.name: Roberta Csóti
profile.description: I graduated as an assistant economic manager at the Faculty of Economics of the University of Szeged. I am currently working as a legal assistant. I am passionate about continuously improving my knowledge and skills. I have attended and I am still attending numerous language courses and data analysis workshops.
